pkgmetadata.longdescription: Poisson Lognormal Models // The Poisson-lognormal model and variants can be used for a variety of multivariate problems when count data are at play, including principal component analysis for count data (Chiquet, Mariadassou and Robin, 2018 doi:10.1214/18-AOAS1177), discriminant analysis and network inference (Chiquet, Mariadassou and Robin, 2018 http://proceedings.mlr.press/v97/chiquet19a.html). Implements variational algorithms to fit such models accompanied with a set of functions for visualization and diagnostic.
